card.name: Serafhin's Timekeeper
card.text: Serafhin’s Timekeeper enters tapped. {T}: Add one mana of any color, spend this mana only to cast instant or sorcery spells. {3}, {T}, Sacrifice Serafhin’s Timekeeper: Draw two cards. Activate only if you’ve cast an instant or sorcery spell this turn.

card.name: Stations Guide
card.text: When Stations Guide enters, you may search your library for a basic land card or Station card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle. Conjure a card named Fatigue on top of your library. (It’s a colorless sorcery that costs {2} with “Draw a card.”)

card.text: Menace Ward—Discard a card Whenever a creature card leaves your graveyard, you may discard a card, if you do, create a token that’s a copy of that creature card, except it has haste. Sacrifice it at the beginning of your next end step. Do this only once each turn.

card.name: Fixed Point in Reality
card.text: {T}, Sacrifice Fixed Point in Reality: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle. Stationcycling {1} ({1}, Discard this card: Search your library for a Station card, reveal it, and put it into your hand, then shuffle.)

card.name: Disciplinary Guard
card.text: Prowess When Disciplinary Guard enters, [target instant or sorcery card in your graveyard gains flashback until end of turn. The flashback cost is equal to its mana cost.] (You may cast that card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.) Paradigm shift {U} (You may cast this as an instant spell with only the text in square brackets for {U})

card.name: Honor Roll Blademaster
card.text: Whenever Honor Roll Blademaster dies, [Exile the top two cards of your library. Until the end of your next turn, you may play one of them.] Paradigm shift 1R (You may cast this as an instant spell with only the text in square brackets for 1R)

card.name: Swordsmanship Club Clique

card.name: Oni's Muster
card.text: Target creature you control gains double strike until end of turn. The next time an ability of that permanent would trigger this turn, it triggers an additional time.

card.name: Delinquent Oni
card.text: Haste When Delinquent Oni enters, conjure a card named Fatigue and put it on top of your library. (It’s a colorless sorcery that costs {2} with “Draw a card.”)

card.name: Thirst for Inspiration
card.text: Draw three cards. Then discard two cards unless you discard an instant or sorcery card.

card.name: Azure Gust Descendant
card.text: You may pay {U} and exile a card named Fatigue from your graveyard rather than pay this spell’s mana cost. (It’s a colorless sorcery that costs {2} with “Draw a card.”) Flying

card.name: Call to Action
card.text: This spell costs {2} less to cast if it targets a permanent that entered this turn. The owner of target creature or planeswalker puts it into their library second from the top or on the bottom.

card.name: Shattered Ego
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets -3/-0. 3UU: Put enchanted creature into its owner’s library third from the top.

card.name: Point-Blank Singularity
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may conjure a card named Fatigue on top of your library. (It’s a colorless sorcery that costs {2} with “Draw a card.”) Destroy target creature with mana value 2 or less. If Point-Blank Singularity’s additional cost was paid, destroy target creature with mana value 4 or less instead.

card.name: Autumnal Keisei
card.text: Whenever you conjure a card, scry 2.

card.name: Eri, Strict Conductor
card.text: Nonbasic lands your opponents control enter tapped, and lose all abilities except for mana abilities. Stations you control have “{1},{T}:Tap target creature. It loses all abilities until end of turn.”

card.name: Titanic Overseer
card.text: Flying, vigilance Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell with mana value 4 or greater, put a +1/+1 counter on each other creature you control.

card.name: Collaborative Tactics
card.text: Choose one or both — • Target Student creature you control gets +1/+1 and gains indestructible until end of turn. • Target non-Student creature you control gets +1/+1 and gains indestructible until end of turn.

card.name: Part the Shadows
card.text: Choose one or both, then draw a card — • Tap target creature an opponent controls. • Untap target creature you control.

card.name: Keeper of Memory's Flow
card.text: When Keeper of Memory’s Flow enters, you may discard a card. If you do, search your library for an instant or sorcery card with mana value 4 or greater or with {X} in its mana cost, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle. {T}: Add {G}, {W} or {U}. Spend this mana only to cast an instant or sorcery spell.

card.name: Yurie, Stationside Performer
card.text: Whenever you attack, up to one target attacking creature with power less than or equal to the number of Stations you control can’t be blocked this turn. Whenever a creature you control deals damage to an opponent, conjure a card named Fatigue into your hand. (It’s a colorless sorcery that costs {2} with “Draw a card.”)

card.name: Cognitive Conjurer
card.text: Flash If an opponent would draw one or more cards, except from a source named Fatigue or the first card they draw during each of their turns, they instead conjure that many cards named Fatigue into their hand. (It’s a colorless sorcery that costs {2} with “Draw a card.” They’re colorless sorceries that cost {2} with “Draw a card.”)

card.name: Manifestation of Self
card.text: Prowess Whenever Manifestation of Self enters or attacks, you may [create a token that’s a copy of target creature] you don’t control with mana value less than or equal to Manifestation of Self’s power. Paradigm shift 3U (You may cast this as an instant spell with only the text in square brackets for 3U)

card.name: Annul Confidence
card.text: Choose one — •Counter target instant or sorcery spell. • Counter target activated or triggered ability.

card.name: Fact or Fiction
card.text: Reveal the top five cards of your library. An opponent separates those cards into two piles. Put one pile into your hand and the other into your graveyard.

card.name: Voidfall
card.text: Choose one or three — • Target player mills nine cards. • Create an X/X Void Horror creature token, where X is the number of instant and sorcery cards in your graveyard. • Conjure a card named Fatigue on top of your library. (It’s a colorless sorcery that costs {2} with “Draw a card.”)

card.name: Delaying Rain
card.text: Return up to two target creatures to their owners’ hands. If three or more mana from Stations was spent to cast this spell, draw two cards, then discard a card.

card.name: Academy Reinforcements
card.text: Choose one or three — • Create two 1/1 white and black student creature tokens. • Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control. • Conjure a card named Fatigue on top of your library. (It’s a colorless sorcery that costs {2} with “Draw a card.”)

card.name: Holowing Prowler
card.text: Holowing Prowler enters tapped. 2B: Return Holowing Prowler from your graveyard to the battlefield. This costs {1} less to activate for each creature that died this turn.

card.name: Archery Club Arcbow
card.text: Deathtouch At the beginning of each end step, if a creature card left your graveyard this turn, you may return Archery Club Arcbow from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Kajiwara's Lieutenants
card.text: Menace Whenever you conjure one or more cards, create a 2/2 black Soldier artifact creature token. Whenever you cast a conjured spell, target soldier you control gets +1/+1 and gains menace until end of turn.

card.name: Warped Horizon
card.text: When Warped Horizon enters, you draw X cards and lose X life, where X is the amount of mana from Stations spent to cast it. Whenever a station under your control enters, you draw a card and lose 1 life.

card.name: Stir the Pot
card.text: Choose one or three — • Target opponent loses 3 life. • Return target creature card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield. • Conjure a card named Fatigue on top of your library. (It’s a colorless sorcery that costs {2} with “Draw a card.”)

card.name: Lost to Time
card.text: Exile up to two target attacking creatures until target nonland permanent you control leaves the battlefield.

card.name: Kazue, Rebellious Beat
card.text: First strike, prowess. At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may cast target instant or sorcery card with mana value less than or equal to the number of Stations you control from your graveyard without paying its mana cost. If that spell would be put into your graveyard, exile it instead.

card.name: Hammer Rush Ushi-Oni
card.text: Trample Whenever Hammer Rush Ushi-Oni attacks, [up to two target creatures can’t block this turn.] Paradigm shift 1R (You may cast this as an instant spell with only the text in square brackets for 1R)

card.name: Consuming Ignition
card.text: Target creature you control gets +2/+0 and gains haste until end of turn. When that creature dies this turn, it deals damage equal to its power to any target.

card.name: Hellraiser's Mark
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and gains prowess. Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, enchanted creature deals 1 damage to each opponent.

card.name: Jorugumo Troublemaker
card.text: Deathtouch, reach Whenever Jorugumo Troublemaker becomes the target of a spell you control, it gets +2/+0 until end of turn. Untap it.

card.name: Biology Club Forager
card.text: When Biology Club Forager enters, choose one — • Destroy target artifact or enchantment with mana value 3 or less. • Mill three cards. You may put a creautre or land card from among the cards milled this way into your hand.

card.name: Wayward Behemoth

card.name: Helios Ignition

card.name: Reality Disentanglement
card.text: Up to one target creature you control phases out. All creatures get -2/-2 until end of turn.

card.name: Hitoshi, Radiant Performer
card.text: Vigilance, haste Whenever Hitoshi, Radiant Performer becomes the target of a spell you control, put a +1/+1 counter on it. If this is the second time this ability has resolved this turn, draw a card.

card.name: Paradox Seraph
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may conjure up to two cards named Fatigue on top of your library. This spell costs {1} less to cast for each card conjured this way. (They’re colorless sorceries that cost {2} with “Draw a card.”) Flying Whenever Paradox Seraph attacks, draw a card, then you may reveal it. If it’s named Fatigue, you gain 3 life.

card.name: Immaterium Studies
card.text: Instant and sorcery spells you cast cost {1} less to cast. Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

card.name: Naoko, the Hopestruck
card.text: Vigilance When Naoko, the Hopestruck enters, you may discard a card. If you do, conjure two cards named Fatigue into your hand. (They’re colorless sorceries that cost {2} with “Draw a card.”) {T}: Add CC, activate only if you’ve drawn two or more cards this turn.

card.name: Conductor Mechanist
card.text: As long as you’ve cast an instant or sorcery spell this turn, other creatures you control get +1/+1 and menace. When Conductor Mechanist enters, mill five cards, then you may exile any number of instant and/or sorcery cards from your graveyard. For each card exiled this way, create a 1/1 white and black Student creature token.

card.name: Urenkal's Warp
card.text: Destroy target nonland permanent. That permanent’s controller reveals cards from the top of their library until they reveal a permanent card that shares a type with it. That player puts that card onto the battlefield, then shuffles the rest into their library.

card.name: Shrine Shadowspear
card.text: Menace Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)

card.name: Inami, Taraikyo Star
card.text: Whenever you cast a spell that targets Inami, Taraikyo Star, if you don’t control a creature named Benkei, create Benkei, a legendary 4/3 colorless Cat Construct artifact creature token with haste and “at the beginning of your end step, sacrifice this creature”, then copy that spell. That copy must target Benkei.

card.name: Center of Performance
card.text: Return target creature with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste until end of turn. Up to one target creature must block it this turn if able.

card.name: Backstage Film Crew
card.text: Whenever Backstage Film Crew becomes the target of a spell you control for the first time each turn, exile the top card of your library. You may play that card until the end of your next turn. Whenever another creature you control becomes the target of a spell you control, put a +1/+1 counter on it.

card.name: Gates of Mist
card.text: {T}: Exile target card from a graveyard. {7}, {T}, Sacrifice Gates of Mist: Look at the top X cards of your library, where X is the number of cards exiled with Gates of Mist. Put up to two of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.name: Mysterious Notebook
card.text: When Mysterious Notebook enters, conjure a card named Fatigue into your hand. (It’s a colorless sorcery that costs {2} with “Draw a card.”) {1}, {T}, Sacrifice Mysterious Notebook: Add one mana of any type.
